p: Option 5 was selected for the transformation of the RD variable. The RD was therefore converted into a categorical variable (RDC) for the subsequent analyses as (1) it exhibited the lowest AIC score among comparable models, (2) had high explained deviance, and (4) allowed us to keep the entire dataset without imputation of missing data for transmission events. All the results of the binomial regression univariate model for different options of the RD on the risk of autochthonous arbovirus transmission are shown in S1 Appendix.
